io.micronaut.data.runtime.operations.internal

Interface OpContext<Cnt,PS>

  • Type Parameters:
    Cnt - The connection type
    PS - The statement type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRepositoryOperations, AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations, DefaultJdbcRepositoryOperations, DefaultMongoRepositoryOperations

    @Internal
public interface OpContext<Cnt,PS>
    The internal context.
